name: Combination Kitchen
description:
Combination Kitchen

'Combination Kitchen' is my entry to the 2022 WannaYam Game Jam (Hosted by SamYam + WannibeManisha)!

Chef Manisha wants to bake a Golden Yam Cake, but is missing the core ingredient - a yam!! You need to guide her to the store to buy a yam to bake her cake!

My first Game Jam ever, Combination Kitchen, features the mission to combine ingredients together to make a delicious golden yam cake! To complete the recipe, players must play through a variety of different game types, including point-and-click, platformer, and puzzle modes!
